about_the_game:
The alarm sounds, and the house is on fire!

As a firefighter, you must quickly extinguish the flames. But this isn't an ordinary firefighting mission: bedrooms echoing with eerie laughter, shattered mirrors everywhere, and complex mechanisms throughout the house test your wit and courage. Can you reach the source of the fire and successfully put it out?

  • Brave Firefighter:

The house is on fire, and the situation is urgent! You tell your teammates to step back, and you venture alone to extinguish the source of the fire. Grab the extinguisher, put on your mask, and charge into the flames. You are the hope of the fire brigade!

  • Dimensional Puzzles:

Watch out! This house contains two worlds, and your actions will simultaneously affect both dimensions!

  • Unlock the House's Mechanisms:

The blocked paths, the locked doors—explore every inch of the room carefully to open the way forward.

This game is created by @lightno2 with YAHAHA Horror Game Kit and YAHAHA assists the creator with packaging and publishing the game based on their request. Yahaha Horror Gamekit is tailored for imaginative creators and players who adore horror games, all without the need for any programming expertise.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Mild scares or horror scenes, General Mature Content.

name: Specular Cranny

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: window 10 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

short_description: As a firefighter, your mission is to put out a fire in a house. However, the debris from the fire blocks your path. You'll need to make full use of the room's mechanisms and the items you pick up to reach the fire source and successfully extinguish it.
